verbs.description: At Donald Trump 's meeting with President Obama last week , Trump [V: was] surprised by the wide range of the president 's job , according to The Wall Street Journal .

[ARGM-LOC: At Donald Trump 's meeting with President Obama last week] , [ARG1: Trump] was [V: surprised] [ARG0: by the wide range of the president 's job] , [ARGM-ADV: according to The Wall Street Journal] .
At Donald Trump 's meeting with President Obama last week , Trump was surprised by the wide range of the president 's job , [V: according] to The Wall Street Journal .
